name: url_metrics
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool domain_da_pa_check.
Tool description: Domain authority score & page authority score, spam score, backlink count information.
API description: Fetches and returns various metrics for a given target URL, such as Domain Authority Score, Page Authority Score, Spam Score, and Total Backlinks, using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

target.description: The target URL, page, or domain for which to fetch the metrics.
